author: James Joyce
text: Madam i ave today finished the draft No 2 in nice MS of peece of prose yr rispected O/ to me which i will now give 1 coat of french polish to same which will turn out A 1 as desired it is a very nice peece and i ope same will be found most sootable to your bespoke in question i am, Madam trly yrs Z (his mark)
